unnormalised: Driving License! Agar tsu chhukh irādah karān Hindustānich sadkaan pyeth gādī chālāvun, su chhū zarūrī. Regional Transport Office (RTO) dvārā jāree karān, yihī sabat karan chhū kih tsu chhukh mukhtalif kisman hund gādī chālavanīch ījāzat diyi geʾyi. Yimich andar chhū tsuʾndī tasveer, sarṇāv, ʾte license number, aksar DL-1234202300000 jiyith formatich andar. Hamesha chhū tsuʾndī driving license nīvaan yatī vakt tsu chhukh wheelich peth.
